meanings.sent1: The talented graffitists painted a colorful mural on the wall.
meanings.sent2: The city hired graffitists to beautify the old buildings with their art.
meanings.sent3: The graffitists left their mark on the train station, much to the surprise of commuters.
meanings.sent4: The graffitists' creations transformed the dull alley into a vibrant gallery.
meanings.sent5: Passersby admired the graffitists' skillful work on the abandoned warehouse.

meanings.definition: Those who engage in the act of graffiti.
meanings.sent1: The group of graffitists gathered at night to spray paint the bridge.
meanings.sent2: Authorities are working to prevent graffitists from defacing public property.
meanings.sent3: The graffitists' secret mission was to add color to the gray city walls.
meanings.sent4: The graffitists' rebellious spirit was evident in their bold tags around town.
meanings.sent5: The community came together to clean up after the graffitists' latest spree.
